message.content: This question requires some knowledge about the behavior and needs of deer. Option (C) is the most likely reason a deer would leave its habitat. Option (A) is incorrect because a light rain would not make the habitat unlivable for a deer. Option (B) is unrelated to the normal behavior of deer and is unlikely to be a reason for leaving its habitat. Option (D) is also unlikely because deer are adapted to withstand changes in temperature and slight changes would not typically cause them to leave their habitat.
